entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 2:13 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:13 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 2:13 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
